logic

Class GroundTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Actor
      • logic.Tile
        • logic.GroundTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Collidable, Updatable

    public class GroundTile
extends Tile
implements java.io.Serializable
    The ground prevents the entities to infinitely fall, giving them a solid ground to walk on.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GroundTile

        public GroundTile(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double position,
                  java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double collisionRect,
                  GameMap gameMap)
        Entities can stand on this tile, acts like a solid ground on the map.
        Parameters:
        position - position of the ground.
        collisionRect - collision box of the ground.
        gameMap - the tile is on this game map's grid.

    • Method Detail

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(PistolBullet pistolBullet)
        Destroying the bullet after it hit this rock solid ground tile. No impact on anything.
        Specified by:
        collideWith in interface Collidable
        Parameters:
        pistolBullet - the bullet which hit the ground.

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(Entity entity)
        Lets the entity walk on the tile without infinitely falling. Also doesn't let entities pass a ground wall. Sets their grounded boolean to true accordingly to the type of collision.
        Specified by:
        collideWith in interface Collidable
        Parameters:
        entity - the actor who collided with the object.

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(Enemy enemy)
        Redirecting to the collision with the entity.
        Specified by:
        collideWith in interface Collidable
        Parameters:
        enemy - is the enemy which collided.

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(Player player)

        Parameters:

      • collideExit

        public void collideExit(Entity entity)
        Using this for testing, just seeing if the tile is colliding.
        Specified by:
        collideExit in interface Collidable
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity which is not colliding anymore.
